title: Cat Haus Part 3
description: Part 3 of 3 In this final installment of the Cat Haus trilogy, Cate and John navigate the rocky terrain of mixing business with pleasure in a legal brothel in Nevada.Don't miss the story told from John' s point of view in BEFORE CATE. Cat Haus, Cat Haus 2 and Cat Haus 3 are available individually or together in the single novel-length compilation Cat Haus - The Complete Story.
author: Cat Johnson
